description: No doubt - this guy was 200% straight. A muscle-boy working as a barman. He looked even a bit dangerous to me at the beginning. But his body and his looks somehow attracted me. But I decided to approach him slowly... not pushing him too much. When I finally asked him if he would ever try sex with a man for money he said no. Last try: I mentioned the amount of 20.000 Czech Crowns. And suddenly I had his attention. Now it was my job to explain him what I exactly wanted. I didn´t mention the fuck as that would have been to fast. So I offered him money for a blowjob. Well, the place we have chosen was too public even for me. After about 4 minutes when the 5th time someone came along disturbing us he agreed to follow me to a hotel.
title: Czech Hunter 192
